entry.title: $2500 // Perfect 1BR Apartment in Brooklyn
entry.content:
Impeccable new development steps to Myrtle-Broadway. Completely modern one bedroom with marble tile flooring, designer kitchen with island, large bedroom with organizational closet, gorgeous bathroom with deep soak tub, great light, huge private terrace and Bluetooth speaker system! Steps to everything you could possibly need. Amazing caf√© Leaf Eatery is downstairs, and short walk to Mr. Kiwi, Little Skips, Happyfun Hideaway, Birdie's, and a plethora of great nightlife and convenience.

Natural Light in Living Area
Stainless Steel Appliances
Central A/C
High Ceilings
Video Intercom
Laundry in building
Outdoor Space
Terrace
Eat In Kitchen
Dishwasher
Built in microwave
Stone countertops
Roof access

Call or text Leo or Marcia at show contact info to schedule a viewing! Thanks! :)
